title: Mona Gasolina Lyrics Lingaa Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Mona Gasolina Lyrics From Lingaa Movie
Lyrics:Madhan Karky
Singer(s):Mano, Neeti Mohan, Tanvi Shah

Mona mona mona mona
hey mona mona
mano Gasolina

adi mona my dear gasolina
nenju thaana kodikkudhadi
tramploleena

Un kannu compass-aa
naa un colampus-aa
nangooram, naan poda
nee aada kadal vedikkudhu
pattaasaa..

gasolina naanthaaney
hey lingaa adalaam
lingaa lingaa

naan inga thangam-naa
neethaan kinga-ah

kappallula thee vechcha
kadalula tea vechcha
kaththodu kaththaaga
en nenjil thee vachcha

Mona mona mona mona
hey mona mona
mano Gasolina

gazzana gazzana
pola un mona.
porkkasu nee allu
thirakkavaa

Neethaney medinga
oh neetha gasolina
Neethaney
oh neetha gasolina

Sarangi nerambanaana
yengi kidandhaen.
nee enna urasa
naan enna marandhaen.

beerangi kulalil
naan thoongi kidandhaen.
nee kadhala koluththa
naan vaanil parandhaen.

sollaa idhu
vella vella manasu
theerpaache

yaarum enna idumunnapola
adichadhillayae.

Mona mona mona mona
hey mona mona
mano Gasolina

adi mona my dear gasolina
nenju thaana kodikkudhadi
tramploleena

ambadichi meen adichaen
ambadichi maan adichaen
ennoda kannoda ammbaala
thaeney unna kudichaen.

Naanthaaney naanthaaney
bonithaa gasolina
Naanthaaney bonithaa gasolina

Un katta viralil
naan raega eduthaen.
adha neththiyila
vachchi naan unna thorandhaen.

Naan kani kaninipol
pootti kidadhaen.
muththa vachi nee thorakka
kadhal sorandhaen.

hey thekka thaekka
idhayatha hack pannu
ulla ulla ena ena
paarthaney.

Yaarum enna idhuvara
sirai pidachadhillaye

Mona mona mona mona
hey mona mona
mano Gasolina

adi mona my dear gasolina
nenju thaana kodikkudhadi
tramploleena

Un kannu compass-aa
naa un colampus-aa
nangooram, naan poda
nee aada kadal vedikkudhu
pattaasaa..
